meanings.definition: A beam or ray of sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The little girl basked in the warm sunbeam.
meanings.sent2: I love waking up to the sunbeam streaming through my window.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat chased after the sunbeam as if it were a playful ribbon.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a sunbeam on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The sunbeam illuminated the room, making everything sparkle.

meanings.definition: To shine or emit beams of sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The sunbeam gently caressed the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The lighthouse can be seen sunbeaming across the ocean at night.
meanings.sent3: The sunbeam danced on the water, creating a beautiful reflection.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to sunbeam through the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sunbeam peeked through the clouds, signaling the end of the storm.
